thread.title_full: UIA Increases Flight Frequency Between Odessa and IstanbulTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: UIA Increases Flight Frequency Between Odessa and IstanbulTravelandtourworld.com
text:
UIA Increases Flight Frequency Between Odessa and Istanbul
UIA will operate non-stop double-daily flights on a full-time basis. The Odessa – Istanbul and Istanbul – Odessa flights will be operated on modern Boeing 737 and Embraer 190 aircraft with two cabin classes – Business Class and Economy Class.
Winter 2015/2016 flight schedule:
Flight Destination Days Departure* Arrival* PS717 Odessa – Istanbul 1234567 12:00 13:30 PS718 Istanbul – Odessa 1234567 14:30 16:00 PS719 Odessa – Istanbul 1234567 01:00+1 02:30+1 PS720 Istanbul – Odessa 12.4567 21:55 23:25 PS720 Istanbul – Odessa ..3…. 22:10 23:40 *Local time
“Having analyzed the performance, passenger traffic and demand in summer 2015, we decided to boost air traffic between Odessa and Istanbul by offering non-stop double-daily flights en route on a full-time basis, – noted Evgeniya Satska, UIA Corporate Press Secretary. – We hope the UIA double-daily service will contribute to further developing commercial and business contacts of Odessa and Istanbul”.
Round-trip economy class ticket fares for Istanbul – Odessa non-stop flights start from 202 Euro (all taxes and surcharges included).
Source:- UIA
